pages.text: Sieving any Leaves and using the String Mesh will output:$(br)-Apple:$(br) 0.025$(br)-Golden Apple:$(br) 0.0005$(br)-Silkworm:$(br) 0.02

$(br)$(br)$(br)Additionally if using any of these Leaf types it will output the equivalent Sapling type with a chance of 0.05:$(br)-Acacia Leaves$(br)-Birch Leaves$(br)-Dark Oak Leaves$(br)-Jungle Leaves$(br)-Oak Leaves$(br)-Spruce leaves
